A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Loved it. I sat in the theatres for the 1st movies (4\, 5\, and 6) and was in awe. 1\, 2\, and 3 were terrible\, absolute trash. I'm no fan of Disney but all of reviews are ridiculous. I'm not sure what movie everyone was watching but The Last Jedi restored some hope\, at least to myself\, that the franchise is heading\, back\, in the right direction. Can't wait to see the next one.
